column1: Smoque BBQ////We arrived around 11:45 and the restaurant was pretty busy.  Luckily
column2: our friends arrived a bit before us and secured a table.  To order at Smoque
column3: you have to walk up to the counter
column5: and then your number will be called.  Considering how busy the restaurant was
column6: we got our food pretty quick.  As we ate our meal
column7: there was a good steady stream of customers moving in and out of the restaurant.  There is a staff that takes empty trays and moves customers along (I assume this is primarily for the lunch time crowd).
